predicate.note: Frames file for 'predicate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: This species of congressional action is predicated [*-50] on an interpretation of the appropriations clause that [*T*-1] is erroneous and unconstitutional .
example.arg: an interpretation of the appropriations clause that [*T*-1] is erroneous and unconstitutional
